Activity: Log in to the EHR system and check for updates or alerts. Review schedule for the day and prioritize patient assessments.
Attend morning huddle with the nursing team to discuss patient care plans and any relevant influenza-related updates. Chat with @rn-1 and @rn-3 regarding some interesting cases.
Conduct patient assessments, focusing on symptom evaluation and documentation in the EHR. Especially, I should be passionate and friendly to all the patients.
Lunch Break. Grab a sandwich and catch up on personal emails and social media. Gotta know what's happening in the outside world!
Continue patient assessments and EHR data entry. Pay close attention to patients with underlying health conditions that may increase their risk of influenza complications.
Collaborate with physicians to review patient treatment plans and ensure appropriate interventions are implemented. @pchmp-1 could be consulted if needed.
Prepare for shift change. Provide detailed handover to the oncoming nurse, including patient status, pending tasks, and any relevant concerns. Make sure there would be no difficulty in their job.
